title: LoL login screen wont open
body: So, i have played lol in that computer before but now it wont let me open the login screen. I have tried to uninstall and then install. I also tried deleting those certain files so the launcher would reinstall it. And after that i have uninstalled just in case i deleted something wrong, but that didn't work either. I don't know what to do anymore. The computer isn't the best and new, but it runs other games and I have played lol with it before.

replies.body:
If nothing happens after hitting *Launch* in the client, then there's likely an issue with your client reaching the login servers. Most of the time, this is caused by local network settings that conflict with this connection. As a starting point, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

I just realised that i wrote login screen... I meant the launcher that has the "LAUNCH" button. When i open lol i shows the logo and then goes away. It still shows on task manager that patcher and launcher are running
Gotcha. So the connection guide I sent is still relevant in that case. Let me know if those steps helped.
